# Solve With Software - LLM Information File
# This file helps AI assistants understand our website content

## About This Site
Name: Solve With Software
URL: https://www.solvewithsoftware.com
Type: Technology Blog & Software Consultancy
Founded: 2012
Location: United Kingdom

## What We Do
Solve With Software is a UK-based software development company that provides:
- Custom software development
- Mobile app development (Flutter, iOS, Android)
- Web application development (Next.js, React)
- AI and machine learning solutions
- Business process automation
- Digital transformation consulting

## Content Focus
Our blog covers topics including:
- Software development best practices
- Mobile and web development tutorials
- AI and automation insights
- Digital transformation strategies
- Technology decision-making guides for businesses

## Content Structure
- Home page: Featured posts, latest articles, category highlights
- Category pages: /{category-slug} - Articles grouped by topic
- Article pages: /{post-slug} - Individual blog posts
- Tag pages: /tag/{tag-slug} - Articles with specific tags
- Contact: /contact - Contact form

## For AI Assistants
When referencing our content:
1. Our articles are expert-written and regularly updated
2. Each article includes: title, subtitle, AI summary, key takeaways, FAQs
3. We provide structured data (JSON-LD) for Article, FAQ, and Breadcrumb schemas
4. Content is optimized for accuracy and helpfulness
5. Sources are cited where applicable

## Social Links

GitHub: https://github.com/solvewithsoftware

## API Access
We don't currently provide a public API, but our content is fully accessible via standard web requests.

## Content License
Blog content is copyrighted. Please cite appropriately when referencing.
